titleStmt.title: Philippe and Marye by the grace of God, Kyng and Queene of England, Fraunce, Naples, Jerusalem, and Irelande ... Philippus & Maria Dei gratia, rex & regina, Angliæ, Franciæ, Neapolis, Ierusalem, & Hiberniæ ...
titleStmt.author: England and Wales. Sovereign (1553-1558 : Mary I)
